name: @aws-sdk-plugin/trusted-identity-propagation-js
description: AWS credential provider that sources credentials that obtains identity-aware credentials for trusted identity propagation

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:types
scripts.clean: node -e "['dist-cjs','dist-es','dist-types'].forEach(dir => fs.rmSync(dir, { recursive: true, force: true }))"
